verses.name: John 11:50
verses.text: Nor consider that it is expedient for us, that one man should die for the people, and that the whole nation perish not.

verses.name: John 11:51
verses.text: And this spake he not of himself: but being high priest that year, he prophesied that Jesus should die for that nation;

verses.name: John 11:52
verses.text: And not for that nation only, but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad.

verses.name: John 11:53
verses.text: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death.
